caption: This place its its permanently closed

First the dirty uniforms then the inappropriate music with profanity, no pride no professionalism no courtesy, customers ignored no napkins, this place is horrible, the 1 star is for convenience, ATTITUDE REFLECTS LEADERSHIP, So if they do not care at the top they will care less at the bottom, it’s also filthy the dirtiest I’ve ever been too
Very dirty. Seems like the employees don't really care about sanitation!

Spilled milk in front of the store, soda machine is not working, garbage all over the store, customers in the back taken stuff and shove it inside their bags, and all that because the guy who works in there invite his all neighborhood to the store to chat and talk mad loud in the store. This guy need to be fired.

I would avoid if possible. I live down the street, every time I go into this place the coffee is either not hot or there is none. The slurpee machines have currently been not working at all and there is a HEAT WAVE! I mean that's just a loss of business for them right there. The employees seem nice enough, so I would argue its managment or ownership who can't get it together. I mean it's a 7-11, my expectations are not high. Either way, something needs to change, but I doubt it will.
I couldn't give it a zero. Bad service and rude. When asked a question they respond as if you are bothering them.

The Worst. In the morning there is an employee that always try to make things difficult and is very rude. Since today I won't buy my morning coffee there anymore. You need to know that in a city where you have SO MANY OPTIONS to buy a coffee, the customer service is extremely important.

This one employee Mikale was amazing he's really Funny makes you feel real important helps you the best way he could. Before he came to the store it wasn't really no good costumer service. So I would like to thank you to whoever hired that guy because he seems to bring a new energy to the store and I love it.

Edit to me previous review: This is the worst 7-eleven location I have ever seen!  They don't have coffee! They never have any coffee ready before 8-9AM, looks like they can't keep up with the demand or start their days late. Also, their coffee is fake! I like Brazilian Single Origin, but here they put other coffee in Brazilian Single Origin bin!  Dirty: no-body ever cleans up, spilled milk on counters, bread crumbs and stuff everywhere.  No utensils, for food or coffee. Personnel is yelling and laughing loudly, very unprofessional. They don't pay attention to customers.  This location was better under previous management, and not I think this location ruins the 7-eleven brand, as I am very disappointing.  When this location opened it was very good, just like most 7 eleven stores. Lately it has been a mess, no coffee in the morning, no coffee cups or lids, garbage everywhere. And today I tried going there after my gym session (5:30AM) and the employee has told me that the store is closed, even though visually there were people buying something there. Absolute mess.

So my neighborhood 7eleven which SHOULD be a convenience store, is anything BUT convenient.  Rude, unprofessional staff, loud inappropriate music (I was so surprised when I asked for the manager they pointed to the woman who was singing the loudest in the place), trash everywhere, countertops dirty, I have no doubt there some kind of infestation in there!  Gladly the local bodegas all got renovated in the last few years - ill be going there from now on.

Usually I Would Give The Store 5 Stars. I Work EMS So This Store Is Typically My Go To Store When I Work My Overnight Shifts On Tuesday Night. However, Tonight When I Attempted To Visit The Store The Employee On Shift Had The Door Locked And Told My Partner And I That The Store Wasn't Open. This Confused Me, Because Its A 24Hour Location And We Normally Go In To The Store Around This Time, When I Tried To Ask How Long Before They Open The Doors,  I Just Received An Annoyed Gaze As If I Did Something Wrong. I Then Tried To Call And Ask, But The Phone Was Ignored. The Employee Just Continued Doing Whatever They Were Doing With Their Headphones In Their Ear, And Inappropriate Attire

7 eleven has everything that a store like this should have. And while i gave it 4 stars i don't think a store like this is needed in this neighborhood. It knocks out the little mom and pop stores that are trying to make a living. Other then that i still give credit where credit is do.
This store leaves food waste out on the sidewalk overnight, which is unsightly, unsanitary and disrespectful.  When confronted, store employees are rude.  Do not shop here.
There is no more coffee. İt should have coffee but at this time no coffee. Ridiculous!
The shelves always seem to be empty, and why would they build two entrances to have one blocked off? Bad designing!
